Title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
Writer: Roy Horniman (based on a novel by), Robert Hamer (screenplay by), John Dighton (screenplay by)
Actors: Dennis Price, Valerie Hobson, Joan Greenwood, Alec Guinness
Plot: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 2 nominations.
